name: Mezase! Skymark: Challenge Airline Pilot
overview: Mezase! Skymark - Challenge Airline Pilot let the player to become himself an airline pilot with this complete flight simulator that will allow to pilot different kind of planes (from the smaller ones to big commercial planes). The game is really complex and will need a lot of hours and all the ability to pass the different tests and then pass the different missions specially since the game simulation is very good and each plane is different to control to the rest.
